channel.title: We at A.T.O.M Labs have built some exciting projects on A.T.O.M Labs
channel.description: Recent content in We at A.T.O.M Labs have built some exciting projects on A.T.O.M Labs

item.title: Aruco Navigation
item.description: Presenting to you another one of our Computer Vision-based projects: Aruco Navigation This project aims to make our self-made mobile base MR_ROBOT navigate through the simulation world using Aruco Markers.

item.title: Curve Tracer
item.description: This project is based on our custom mobile base platform, MR. ROBOT. The project aims to have the robot follow a set of waypoints as closely as possible usin a custom Proportional Controller.

item.title: Line Follower
item.description: This project is a simulation of a Line Following Robot based on Image Processing using real time camera view from the robot. The sim uses our in-house mobile base platform, MR ROBOT.

item.title: Object Follower
item.description: The Object Follower utilizes our in-house mobile base platform, MR Robot and aims to make the robot follow a particular object while also maintaining a safe distance from it.

item.title: Obstacle Avoider
item.description: We have developed a custom obstacle avoidance algorithm that is a mix of BUG 2 and BUG 0 algorithms. The Gazebo Simulation above shows our obstacle avoidance algorithm in action on our MR Robot mobile base platform.
